reviews.review: Muy buen juego, y requiere mucha coordinacion para lograr el objetivo, interesante juego
Graças ao presidente da Albania, eu consegui sobreviver múltiplas vezes seguidas

Jogo muito bom, bla bla bla aquelas coisa lá de "Ain toXico, chetaduuuu, para de fala medaaainnnn"

Ídeia ótima porém mal executada, os devs ficam criando skin ao invés de consertar os bugs do jogo, normal, igual 99% dos mercená... desenvolvedores de jogos.

Jogar de killer?
Deixa pros bot assumir o comando dos trombadinha

Jogar de survivor?
Só se vc tiver com mais 3 corno pra baba seus ovo

Jogar com os amigos?
Ae sim vale a pena, pq n tem oq reclamar, 5 jogadores, 4 de sobrevivente e 1 de assassino, super balanceado, SIM, o modo personalizado é melhor que o modo normal do jogo

Conclusão:
Se for com os amigos é 8/10, se for sozinho é 0/10

O jogo tem fogueira, ent vale a pena, comprem

Плюсы:
-Беги, не беги - догонит и отп*здит
-Еб@ла страшные

The game is very fun at is core. But the matchmaking got worse and worse, at the moment i'm getting stomped in every game. This got to the point it was better for me to uninstall the game as it was not fun for me anymore. 
I tried installed it now and again but the same experience. I played a few games got stomped in all of them with different killers then uninstalled again. There is not even a decay to the hidden MMR.
Would try again if they would rework the MMR system.
El mejor o de los mejores juegos de supervivencia en el mercado y ademas tiene un buen precio, tengo 1000 horas en el juego y realmente me encato!
Game is unbalanced in some areas, but it's fun regardless.
Recomendo, Otimo jogo com trabalho em equipe e melhor ainda para jogar com amigos...

Game is awful. Do not buy. You will want your money back the next day. 

Beginning of the game the killers are so OP so you get wrecked every game but the que times to be a killer are outrageous so you have no choice but to suffer and get destroyed being a survivor. Do not waste your time.

дорогие разработчики сделайте так чтобы катка зависела от маньяка потому что я иногда жду по 20 минут и это не комфортно но так как я потратил в эту игру не малое состояние то я не хочу просто так ее удалять и счетай выбрасывать деньги на ветер ( то что я пишу наверное дич но все же надеюсь на то что вы выполните просьбу)

At first I have to say the game was pretty fun and exciting/scary. 
When you play against killers you haven't played against before and you start learning methods and tricks to escape your killer.
But after some time that magic started to fade and the game started getting more and more boring, the waiting queues got longer and longer... The bugs started getting more annoying, the game got less and less scary/exciting and now I can't force myself to play more than one round even if I'm playing with friends... It just got repetitive even with new content. 
So I'd advise you to think twice before investing in this game. But I mean hey I guess the game can be fun for some people. My friends can play it for hours and hours on end... I guess it just comes down to personal preference.. And I can say for sure that this is not my preference.

if you're looking for an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game, this is the best one. the devs have been putting in a ton of work to improve the game, it's well worth your money. nothing quite like this game.

Хороший тулбокс под крюком не валяется
Чем бы кемпер ни тешился — лишь бы не плакал
Чем богаты - тем и чиним
Ранг по каплям считают
Хочешь жить — умей чинить
Хороша карта, да сгорает рано
Уходя — уходи, не фарми
Услужливый сурв коварнее ведьмы
Умный к звону не пойдет, умный Колю обойдет
Две руки хорошо, а шесть - лучше (когда заводишь генератор)
Шуметь без причины - признак дурачины
Кто рано встаёт, того Фредди не бьёт

Trust me with this one: play something else. There are so many other brilliant games out there that won't gnaw away your sanity.

So, I took a break for more than a year and I have to say, I was impressed to come back. A lot of the bugs were solved! There is still somewhat of an imbalance, but those are excusable. The biggest change is that the comments haven't been extremely toxic since I have been playing and that is a plus. If you love a cool experience, check this game out.
